thread.section_title: Spa Store Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Spa Store Australia | spastore.com.au
thread.title: Colin
thread.title_full: Spa Store Australia reviewed by Colin

author: Colin
title: Colin
text:
Spa store were very helpful, that was when I finally got hold of the right person. Though the cover was off the shelf they advertise only a one year warranty, but advised it was the exact same product and manufacture as the custom made products which are advertised with a 3 year warranty....
After a little investigationing, with the likes of the dept of fair-trading I was advised that they as an Australian company a liable for the 3 year warranty as per consumer law.
Service/delivery were remarkably quick.
And all question were covered promptly once I managed to get hold of what it seems, the only sales person.
Product seems to be performing very well so far, only 3 weeks old!
